column1: For the sea areas in between 20N - 10S and 60E-100E
(Issued at 07.00 a.m. on 10 June 2024, for next 24hours)

Showers or thundershowers will occur at several places in the sea areas off the coast extending
from Puttalam to Hambantota via Colombo and Galle.
Winds will be south-westerly and wind speed will be (30-40) kmph.

ind speed may increase up to (55-60) kmph at times in the sea areas off the coasts extending
from Trincomalee to Puttalam via Kankasanthurai, Mannar and from Hambantota to Batticaloa
The  sea  areas  off  the  coasts  extending  from  Trincomalee  to  Puttalam  via  Kankasanthurai,
Mannar and from Hambantota to Batticaloa via Pottuvil can be rough at times.

aval and fishing communities are requested to be attentive in this regard.
